block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Activated 2B Jose Offerman from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Dan Smith to Pawtucket of the International League. TEXAS RANGERS--Designated OF Jason McDonald for assignment.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Activated 2B Jose Offerman from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Dan Smith to Pawtucket of the International League. TEXAS RANGERS--Designated OF Jason McDonald for assignment.

National League MONTREAL EXPOS--Placed RHP T.J Tucker on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled LHP David Moraga from Ottawa of the International League. Transferred LHP Matt Blank from the 15- to 60-day DL.

National Hockey League CALGARY FLAMES--Acquired a 2000 second-round draft pick from the Anaheim Mighty Ducks for G Jean-Sebastien Giguere. VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Agreed to terms with D Greg Hawgood and C Darby Hendrickson.
